content: Give me a list of 20 words that end with 'ous'.

I'd be happy to help you with that! Here are 20 words that end with "ous":

1. Curious
2. Dangerous
3. Glorious
4. Mysterious
5. Obvious
6. Ambitious
7. Gracious
8. Hazardous
9. Joyous
10. Spontaneous
11. Victorious
12. Ambivalent
13. Cautious
14. Emulous
15. Fabulous
16. Nervous
17. Pious
18. Reptilian
19. Suspicious
20. Vehement

I hope this list meets your needs! If you have any other questions or need further assistance, please don't hesitate to ask.
